name: Eyre
hint: Australia's largest lake, a usually dry salt flat in South Australia that rarely fills with water

name: Torrens
hint: A large salt lake in South Australia, usually dry, the second-largest lake in Australia

name: Taupo
hint: New Zealand's largest lake, filling a caldera created by a massive volcanic eruption in the North Island

name: Gairdner
hint: A large salt lake in South Australia, used for land speed record attempts due to its flat surface

name: Frome
hint: A salt lake in South Australia, east of the Flinders Ranges, usually dry

name: Te Anau
hint: The largest lake on New Zealand's South Island, gateway to Fiordland National Park and Milford Sound
